original_title: Devin Townsend Presents: Ziltoid Live At The Royal Albert Hall
overview: Ziltoid Live at the Royal Albert Hall is a live release by the Devin Townsend Project of a concert performed on April 13, 2015. It features the entirety of Dark Matters as well as a second set of songs chosen by fans via Facebook vote.
tagline: Devin Townsend played an incredible sold-out show at London's legendary Royal Albert Hall venue.
title: Devin Townsend Presents: Ziltoid Live At The Royal Albert Hall
